family-member-relation.required: Please enter the family member's relationship to you

family-member-full-name.required: Please enter the family member's full name

family-member-dob.required: Please provide the family member's date of birth
family-member-dob.before: Please enter a date in the past

family-member-nationality.required: Please provide a country of nationality

reference-number-option.required: Please select a reference number option
reference-number-option.notBothOptions: You can't choose 'I don't know' and a reference number. You must deselect the 'I don't know' option, or the selected reference number(s) to continue

human-rights-claim-details.required: Please enter details of the human rights claim
human-rights-claim-details.maxlength: Details must be 15,000 characters or less
human-rights-claim-details.regex: Details must not include the following special characters [ ] < > / |
human-rights-claim-details.notUrl: Please do not enter a link/URL into your answers

other-human-rights-claim-details.required: You must enter details of your reasons
other-human-rights-claim-details.maxlength: Explanation must be 15,000 characters or less
other-human-rights-claim-details.regex: Explanation must not include the following special characters [ ] < > / |
other-human-rights-claim-details.notUrl: Please do not enter a link/URL into your answers

uan-detail.regex: Enter a valid UAN. For example, 3455-9874-2349-0753

ho-number-detail.required: Enter the Home Office reference number
ho-number-detail.notUrl: Please do not enter a link/URL into your answers
ho-number-detail.regex: Enter a valid Home Office (HO) reference number. The format should be one capital letter followed by seven numbers
